attributes.action: Take a tougher action on teen thuggery and binge drinking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Action has now got to be taken against these yobs who are making peoples lives a misery, prisoners in there own homes, how many more vicious attacks and deaths is it going to take before the government takes notice, harsh sentences are called for and a tougher line taken by both the Police and the Courts instead of the culprits walking away to attack again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
